title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 386/92 of 18 February 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2742/91 on the sale by the procedure laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 2539/84 of beef held by certain intervention agencies and intended for export to the Soviet Union
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 386/92  of 18 February 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 2742/91 on the sale by the procedure laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 2539/84 of beef held by certain intervention agencies and intended for export to the  Soviet Union
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date '1 September 1991' referred to in the first and second indents of Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2742/91 is replaced by '1 December 1991'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24. (2) OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 16. (3) OJ No L 262, 19. 9. 1991, p. 13.
